nl.esciencecenter.esight.textures

Class Texture2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.textures.Texture
      • nl.esciencecenter.esight.textures.Texture2D
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ByteBufferTexture, ImageTexture, PostProcessTexture, RBOTexture

    public abstract class Texture2D
extends Texture
    2-Dimensional Texture object representation. Provides some generic methods and variables for all types of 2-Dimensional textures.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Texture2D(int glMultitexUnit)
      Generic constructor, should be called by all classes extending this class to set the glMultitexUnit.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Texture2D

        public Texture2D(int glMultitexUnit)
        Generic constructor, should be called by all classes extending this class to set the glMultitexUnit. Do not forget to call init(javax.media.opengl.GL3) before use.
        Parameters:
        glMultitexUnit - The OpenGL-internal MultitexUnit (GL.GL_TEXTUREX) this texture uses.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl)
        Initialization method generic for all 2-D Textures. Allocates space on the device and copies data from the pixelBuffer into it. Therefore, pixelBuffer cannot be null, or an error will be generated.
        Parameters:
        gl - The current OpenGL instance.

      • use

        public void use(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl)
         throws UninitializedException
        Throws:
        UninitializedException

      • unBind

        public void unBind(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl)
